attributes.action: Abolish the English test for workers on the shortage/skilled list. Stablehands
attributes.additional_details: I run a yard as do a couple of my close friends and we are really struggling for staff . Horse racing has been experiencing staff difficulties for the last few years but coming towards winter now , it’s hitting a crisis point. Brexit etc hasn’t helped.
attributes.background:
To abolish the English test for people working in horse racing , stable hands and riders. 
We are experiencing a severe staff shortage in our sector. Horse racing is in a crisis. We need more skilled workers coming in to our industry.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Stablehands are not currently on the Shortage Occupation list

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/skilled-worker-visa-shortage-occupations/skilled-worker-visa-shortage-occupations

In any case, the langauge requirement is not specific to occupations.
